name: An Accursed Race
author: Gaskell, Mrs.
Mills, Cotton Mather
Gaskell, Elizabeth Cleghorn
Stevenson, Elizabeth
Gaskell, Elizabeth C.
Gaskell, Elizabeth Cleghorn Stevenson
Gaskell, E. C. (Elizabeth Cleghorn)
body:
What faults you saw in me,
      Pray strive to shun;
    And look at home; there's
      Something to be done.
